name: Eftykhar
description: Highly skilled and dependable with hands-on experience and excellent training to perform service, diagnostics, and repairs on domestic and imported automobiles and trucks.

name: Raufu
description: Contribute to repeat and referral business through strong problem-solving skills and commitment to top-quality workmanship and excellent customer service.

name: Tanvir
description: Expertise interpreting technical specifications; provide leadership to other mechanics to increase repair accuracy, minimize lost time, and ensure safety compliance.

name: Sifat
description: Participate in continuous training and professional development activities to maintain current knowledge of rapidly advancing automotive technologies.

name: Prezens
description: Recognized by management for expertise and routinely called upon for recommendations; provided valuable guidance that led to avoidance of lost time and damaged parts.
